wikipedia_page.main: Laddie Cliff (3 September 1891–8 December 1937) was a British dancer, choreographer, actor, producer, writer, and director of comedy, musical theatre and film.  He was noted for his versatility.  His many London West End theatre appearances and films included a long association with fellow thespian Stanley Lupino.  He was married to the actress Phyllis Monkman. He died in 1937 after a period of ill health.
